title: How to Make a Banana Split Shot

steps.headline: Measure and pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur, 99 Bananas banana schnapps, and Godiva chocolate liqueur in a cocktail shaker.
Place a lid on or another glass on top and secure.
Shake well until ingredients are thoroughly mixed.
Pour the contents into a shot glass and top it off with a cherry.
Shoot the drink and eat the cherry.

text: Measure and pour the Kahlua coffee liqueur, 99 Bananas banana schnapps, and Godiva chocolate liqueur in a cocktail shaker.  Place a lid on or another glass on top and secure.  Shake well until ingredients are thoroughly mixed.  Pour the contents into a shot glass and top it off with a cherry.  Shoot the drink and eat the cherry.  Finished.
